<rule id="springboot-properties-to-quarkus-00006" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <filecontent filename="application{profile}.{extension}" pattern="springdoc.api-docs.path"/>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="1" title="Replace Spring OpenAPI endpoint mapping">
                    <message>
                        Replace `springdoc.api-docs.path` with `quarkus.smallrye-openapi.path`
                        
                    </message>
                    <link href="https://quarkus.io/guides/openapi-swaggerui" title="Quarkus Guide - using OpenAPI and Swagger"/>
                    <quickfix name="openapi-replace" type="REPLACE">
                        <replacement>quarkus.smallrye-openapi.path</replacement>
                        <search>springdoc.api-docs.path</search>
                    </quickfix>
                </hint>
            </perform>
            <where param="profile">
                <matches pattern=".*"/>
            </where>
            <where param="extension">
                <matches pattern="(properties|yml|yaml)"/>
            </where>
        </rule>
